WorkItem.Description:
Hi Roman, 

First thanks for releasing this great work. I am having trouble to open and compile the solution. VS2008 is complaining about source control binding and most projects loaded with the unavailable status. I have tried to unbind the source control but still no luck. (This may not be the reason, but I am using 64bit Windows 7 environment.) Is there a way you can release the source code not biding to source control? Thanks

Duncan

Comments.Message:
Roman, please ignore my last post. I am new to codeplex, and just notice the source control feature. I should give it a try first. 

D

Well, getting source codes via source control client does not fix the problem. So still in the same problem cannot compile the solution. 

D
try downloading release version - I removed bindings and updated the zip
Thanks Roman. It works for me now.
